column4: when i delete the files from pen drive, it seems to be deleted but while checking from windows, it show the .traced file there what is the probem in Ubuntu

i found problem in Ubuntu system ,when i delete the files from pen drive, it seems to be deleted but while checking from windows, it show the .traced file there what is the probem in Ubuntu
can you try doing "Ctrl" + "+" and "Ctrl" + "-" and see whether your resolution changes ?
alternatively you can try changing through System->Preferences->Screen Resolution
can you please paste your /etc/X11/xorg.conf
please use pastebin
are you using the proper refresh rates for your monitor ?
sorry was away
i could not solve resolution problem
did you manually add the screen resolutions to xorg.conf ?
i think the resolutions has to be mentioned from larger to smaller
did you add the resolutions by hand ?
please change it starting from high to low
also you can check /var/log/Xorg.0.log for any errors
how did you restart X
i think you may need to logout and do "startx" from the terminal
